Text:
Just so people know, this torrent contains:

A lecture series about Nietzsche by Robert Solomon, which I highly recommend.

A Biography and Analysis of Nietzche that spans four audio files.

NONE OF THESE BOOKS ARE BY NIETZSCHE but it's a good secondary learning experience :)
In case someone's interested, the lectures by Robert Solomon are lecture 10-13 from his series of lectures for The Teaching Company called "No Excuses: Existentialism and the Meaning of Life".
